meaning_str.bing:
n. 河；河流
网络. 江；河牌；川

河流；江河；大河；水道；河道；大量（液体、人群等）；巨流；河川（用于地名）；（液体）涌流

1.en: Thornton was in the boat, while Hans and Pete moved along the river bank, holding the boat with a rope.
1.cn: 桑顿在船上，而汉斯和皮特则沿着河岸走，用一根绳索拉住小船。

2.en: We had a fine company of these river-inspectors along, this trip.
2.cn: 本航次，我们有一群河流巡视员随船同行。

3.en: Julia felt a whirl of wind blow her hair up and swish in her face. It was like a canoe going against the rapids in a river.
3.cn: 茱莉亚觉得有阵风把自己的头发吹了起来，嗖嗖声擦面而过。那就像独木舟在激流中行进。

0.en: The rains will return and the river will rise.
0.cn: 雨季会再来，河面将升高。

1.en: I got an A320 diving for the river. Al, stack all the inbounds to LaGuardia.
1.cn: 我们这有架A320要坠河，阿尔，暂停拉瓜迪亚的所有进场。

2.en: Notre Dame Cathedral is situated on Ile de la Cite, a natural island in the River Seine.
2.cn: 西堤岛是塞纳-马恩省河中的一座天然岛屿，岛上座落着知名的圣母院。

3.en: Oh, yeah, sure. There's also an amazing documentary about building a dam on a river in South America.
3.cn: 对，没错，不过还有一场精彩的纪录片讲述在南美洲的一条河上建一座水坝。

4.en: Look, I'm sorry if you're frustrated, but our job is to investigate how a plane ended up in the Hudson River.
4.cn: 我并无意想惹恼你，可我们的工作就是去调查飞机掉进哈德逊河的原因。

5.en: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are taking Peppa and George out for a day on the river. Welcome aboard, me hearties!
5.cn: 今天猪爷爷要带佩琪和乔治外出到河上玩一玩。欢迎上船，我的小宝贝们！

6.en: Sounds interesting. Or there is Duckland. What's Duckland? It's a wide river full of ducks.
6.cn: 听上去很有意思。还有这个鸭子乐园。什么是鸭子乐园？是一条很宽的河，上面都是鸭子。

7.en: Man, I'm such a big fan! You guys were totally amazing at the Battle of Weeping River. Outnumbered a thousand to one, but you didn't stop.
7.cn: 我太崇拜你们了，叹息河之战你们是在太英勇了。以一挡百，奋勇向前。

8.en: The River Seine runs right through the heart of Paris, creating a natural divide between her famous Left and Right Banks.
8.cn: 塞纳-马恩省河自巴黎的心脏地带流过，自然地将巴黎划分为著名的左岸和右岸。

9.en: We can't stop our movement down this river, and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
9.cn: 我们身在时间之河上停不下来，也无法避免问题。我们只能选择最好的处理办法。

10.en: Yes. The best chance those passengers had was on that river. And I'd bet my life on it. In fact, I did. And I would do it again.
10.cn: 对，那条河是机上乘客生还的最大希望，我决定豪赌一把，事实就是这样，我还会再赌一次。

11.en: The picnic spot is on the other side of the river. Oh, how do we get over there? We take a little boat. You call it by ring this bell.
11.cn: 那个野餐区在河的另一边。哦，我们要怎么过去？我们坐小船过去。你可以摇铃叫船过来。

12.en: George has made the toy basket into a volcano. Richard is using toy trees to make a jungle. George has used the building blocks to make a river.
12.cn: 乔治把玩具篮变成了一座火山。理查德用玩具树做成了丛林。乔治还用积木搭出了一条河。

13.en: On the Hudson River. Isn't it a little early in the year to go fishing? Seeking the facts is hardly "fishing," Mr. Skiles.
13.cn: 是浮在哈德逊河上，今年这个时候去“钓鱼”是不是早了点？寻求事实跟“钓鱼”完全是两码事，斯基尔斯先生。

14.en: If we draw a line from the bottom of the San Andreas up to the Hoover dam, it almost literally follows the Colorado river, which is a natural deformation event.
14.cn: 如果我们画一条线，从圣安德烈亚斯底部直通到胡佛大坝，可以发现这条线几乎是沿着科罗拉多河的，而那条河流是自然变形造成的。

15.en: When I was little, my mother would sing a song about a special river called Ahtohallan, that was said to hold all the answers about the past, about what we are a part of.
15.cn: 我小时候，我妈妈会给我唱一首歌，歌里唱了一条特别的河 叫作亚托哈伦，据说那条河里有所有关于过去的答案，关于我们身处的这个世界。

16.en: Drive straight ahead into the river. Oh. Are you sure? Yes, drive into the river.
16.cn: 向前始终直行开到河里。噢！你确定吗？确定，请你开到河里。

17.en: But we can't drive in the river. Yes, it's talking nonsense.
17.cn: 但是我们不能开进河里呀。没错，这根本就是在胡说。

18.en: An IED right off Route 90, three kilometers from the Jordan River.
18.cn: 简易爆炸装置，就在90号公路旁，距约旦河三千米处。

19.en: I shouted back. I guess the river... Are you okay? I love you, son.
19.cn: 我也喊回去的，我猜河水... 你没事吧？我爱你，儿子。
